resources.string: This game is like sudoku, but with hexagons instead of squares. Tap on a hexagon to change the number. You win if you manage to fill all the hexagons such that …
… there are only different numbers in every group with a different color …
… only different numbers in the direction of this red line …
… and only different numbers in the direction of this red line …
… aaand only different numbers in the direction of this line.
This app showcases a variant of sudoku that makes use of hexagons instead of squares.
